## Observation notes  
First documented by Cresson, 1878b, with extensive historical record in the Pacific Maritime (see Best list for historical record to 2000).  Tommasi et al. 2004: <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Greater <span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span></span> Area</span>. Ratti et al. 2008: <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>. Biodiversity Galiano Life List: (G.G.E. Scudder), 1974, Galiano. Guzman et al., 2023: (Wray), 2012; (Gillespie), 2014; (Kelly), 2017, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. (Gehrels), 2013, <span class="hl-place-name">Tsawwassen</span>. (Toshack), 2015, <span class="hl-place-name">Surrey</span>. NBSBC Bee Atlas Database: (Gadzik), 2022, (Lee), 2023, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. iNaturalist: <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Gulf Islands</span>, Metro <span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span>, from 1988.
